purpose: Télécom Paris is hiring a postdoctoral researcher for a 30-month position in software engineering and cybersecurity. The role is part of the SECUBIC project, which aims to enhance the security of binary executables that include open source components. The ACES team will develop techniques and tools using Software Heritage as a knowledge base to improve binary software composition analysis. Interested candidates can find the complete job description in both English and French, with an application deadline of 31 August 2025.
